name: Tilestone
text: On K.O.: If your Leader has the {Galley-La Company} type, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! Deck and rest it.

effect.text: If your Leader has the {Galley-La Company} type, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! Deck and rest it.

meta.notes: Rarity 'C' is confirmed from the bottom right corner of the card. The card is a sample, indicated by the 'SAMPLE' watermark.
